preprocessing_helper module¶

class preprocessing_helper.PreProcessingHelper¶

Bases: object

This class is used to handle data pre-processing

clean_corpus_to_ids(clean_corpus, tokenizer, max_len)¶

convert cleaned corpus to word ids

Parameters

  • clean_corpus (list(str)) – cleaned corpus

  • tokenizer – tokenizer

  • max_len (int) – max length of word for each documents

Returns

numpy array with shape (len(clean_corpus), max_len)

clean_docs(doc_list_raw)¶

Clean raw corpus, clean up items include:

  1. lower case all words

  2. allow only alphabetical letters

  3. remove extra space

Parameters

doc_list_raw – list raw documents (str)

Returns

cleaned corpus

get_tokenizer(file_path)¶

Get tokenizer from pickle file

Parameters

file_path – path to pickle file

Returns

tokenizer, None if there is no file saved

get_train_val_test(file_path)¶

Get preprocessed data from pickle file

Parameters

file_path (str) – path to pickle file

Return list

list of preprocessed data [X_train, y_train, X_val, y_val, X_test]

save_train_val_test(data_list, file_path)¶

save preprocessed data into a pickle file

Parameters

  • data_list – [X_train, y_train, X_val, y_val, X_test]

  • file_path – path to the pickle file

setup_tokenizer(cleaned_corpus, vocab_size, save_tokenizer=False, file_path=None)¶

Construct tokenizer based on cleaned corpus

Parameters

  • cleaned_corpus (list) – a list of documents (str). see function clean_docs for cleaning method

  • vocab_size (int) – the size of vocabulary

  • save_tokenizer (bool) – if tokenizer is going to be saved in a pickle file

  • file_path (str) – specify the file path where tokenizer is going to be saved

Returns

constructed tokenizer

train_batch_generator(batch_size)¶

Generator for training batch, once it reach the end of training set, start over again

Parameters

batch_size (int) – size of batch

Returns

training batch (yield)

validation_batch_generator(batch_size)¶

Generator for validation batch, once it reach the end of validation set, start over again

Parameters

batch_size (int) – size of batch

Returns

validation batch (yield)
